nodes.text: Genetia was an astronomical object that was orbited by seven moons. It was the homeworld of the human male Imri Cantaros, before he eventually ended up at the Jedi Temple on Coruscant where he spent his youngling years. The seven Genetian moons were used as an exclamation by the Nihil pirate Klinith Da after she saw the large cruiser Steady Wing, which she and fellow pirate Gwishi had been sent to destroy.

Genetia was mentioned in the 2021 novel The High Republic: A Test of Courage written by Justina Ireland. In chapter four, Cantaros is stated to be from Genetia. Chapter 18, however, states he is from Hynestia.
